Description: Hollow-cast copper-alloy figure of Canopus, wearing wig and Atef-crown, with various emblems on front in raised relief, including two hawks with double crowns, a plaque and a scarab-beetle.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2022-2023 3 Sept-1 Jan, Norwich, Sainsbury Centre, Visions of Ancient Egypt (tour) 2023 28 Jan-29 Apr, Newcastle, Laing Art Gallery, Visions of Ancient Egypt (tour)
